Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on his friendship with fellow public employees, this film depicts our social history at the beginning of the Showa period when Japan went through drastic change from Meiji era into modernization.
